name: projects/wayfairy-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFMR9821
title: Aalijah Geometric Hand-Knotted Wool Blue/Ivory Area Rug
description: Anchor your living room or den in contemporary style with this eye-catching area rug. Hand-knotted from 100% premium wool, it showcases a striking geometric pattern in shades of navy blue and ivory. The medium pile height provides a comfortable feel underfoot, making it an ideal choice for high-traffic areas. To maintain its beauty, we recommend professional cleaning and the use of a rug pad to prevent shifting and sliding.

name: projects/wayfairy-dev/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WFMR8831
title: Albright Abstract Gray/Blue Area Rug
description: Anchor your living room or den in contemporary style with this abstract area rug. Power-loomed from durable polypropylene, this rug features a low 0.35'' pile height, making it an ideal base for a busy space since it's easy to clean and won't trip up your feet. It showcases a cool-toned abstract pattern in hues of gray, blue, and ivory, perfect for adding a touch of modern artistry to your floor. For extra cushioning and to prevent slipping, we recommend adding a coordinating rug pad underneath.

name: projects/wayfairy/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/KCT1001
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Rachael Ray Create Delicious 13-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set
description: Whip up delicious meals with the Rachael Ray Create Delicious 13-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set. Crafted from durable aluminum for quick and even heating, this set features a long-lasting, platinum-strong nonstick interior for easy food release and cleanup. The dual-riveted handles provide a comfortable, secure grip, and the shatter-resistant glass lids seal in heat and moisture. Oven safe to 400°F and suitable for all stovetops except induction, this versatile set includes everything you need for your culinary adventures. The vibrant shimmer finish adds a pop of color to any kitchen.

name: projects/wayfairy/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF85CSUSOFA01
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Sand & Stable™ Corinne 85'' Upholstered Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in casual, coastal style with the Corinne sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa features a full back, track arms, and tapered block feet. It's enveloped in a polyester blend upholstery, while foam-filled cushions with springs provide comfortable support. The seat and back cushions are removable and reversible for easy cleaning. This sofa seats three and has a weight capacity of 750 lbs. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WF8810HMPQ
title: Hampton Upholstered Low Profile Standard Bed
description: Anchor your bedroom in a clean, transitional style with this upholstered standard bed. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this bed features a low-profile footboard and side rails, and a handsome panel headboard. The headboard strikes a rectangular silhouette, while button tufting adds a tailored touch. Its neutral polyester upholstery envelops the bed for a soft, textured feel, while dense foam fill offers comfort and support. Center supports and a series of slats accommodate your preferred mattress (not included) without the need for a bulky box spring.

name: projects/wayfairy-cloud/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WF8812KTPPS
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Cuisinart Multiclad Pro 12-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Experience professional-grade cooking with the Cuisinart Multiclad Pro 12-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set. This elegant collection features a triple-ply construction with a pure aluminum core for unsurpassed heat conductivity, ensuring even heat distribution along the bottom and side walls. The stainless steel cooking surface does not discolor, react with food, or alter flavors. Each piece is equipped with cool-grip handles, tight-fitting lids to seal in moisture and nutrients, and drip-free pouring rims. This comprehensive set includes everything a home chef needs and is compatible with all stovetops, including induction.
